se.project.storage.repos.interfaces

Interface MaintenanceActivityRepoInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MaintenanceActivityProxyRepo, MaintenanceActivityRepo

    public interface MaintenanceActivityRepoInterface
    Is a DAO interface that provides method to manipulate Maintenance Activity models.

    • Method Summary

      • assignMaintenanceActivity

        void assignMaintenanceActivity(MaintenanceActivity maintenanceActivity,
                               Maintainer maintainer,
                               java.time.DayOfWeek day,
                               WeeklyAvailability.WorkTurn turn,
                               int minutesAvailable)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.sql.SQLException
        Assign a Maintenance activity to a maintainer.
        Parameters:
        maintenanceActivity - is the activity to be assigned.
        maintainer - is the maintainer who'll work on the activity.
        day - is the day in which the Maintainer will work on that task.
        turn - is the turn in which the Maintainer will work on that task.
        minutesAvailable - are the minutes available for that maintainer.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException
